verses.verse: Now the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> after their number <WH4557>, to wit, the chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1> and captains <WH8269> of thousands <WH505> and hundreds <WH3967>, and their officers <WH7860> <WH8802> that served <WH8334> <WH8764> the king <WH4428> in any matter <WH1697> of the courses <WH4256>, which came in <WH935> <WH8802> and went out <WH3318> <WH8802> month <WH2320> by month <WH2320> throughout all the months <WH2320> of the year <WH8141>, of every <WH259> course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

Over the first <WH7223> course <WH4256> for the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> was Jashobeam <WH3434> the son <WH1121> of Zabdiel <WH2068>: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.
Of the children <WH1121> of Peretz <WH6557> was the chief <WH7218> of all the captains <WH8269> of the host <WH6635> for the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>.

And over the course <WH4256> of the second <WH8145> month <WH2320> was Dodai <WH1737> an Ahohite <WH266>, and of his course <WH4256> was Mikloth <WH4732> also the ruler <WH5057>: in his course <WH4256> likewise were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

The third <WH7992> captain <WH8269> of the host <WH6635> for the third <WH7992> month <WH2320> was Benaiah <WH1141> the son <WH1121> of Y'hoyada <WH3077>, a chief <WH7218> Kohen <WH3548>: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.
This is that Benaiah <WH1141>, who was mighty <WH1368> among the thirty <WH7970>, and above the thirty <WH7970>: and in his course <WH4256> was Ammizabad <WH5990> his son <WH1121>.

The fourth <WH7243> captain for the fourth <WH7243> month <WH2320> was Asahel <WH6214> the brother <WH251> of Yo'av <WH3097>, and Zebadiah <WH2069> his son <WH1121> after <WH310> him: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

The fifth <WH2549> captain <WH8269> for the fifth <WH2549> month <WH2320> was Shamhuth <WH8049> the Izrahite <WH3155>: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

The sixth <WH8345> captain for the sixth <WH8345> month <WH2320> was Ira <WH5896> the son <WH1121> of Ikkesh <WH6142> the Tekoite <WH8621>: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

The seventh <WH7637> captain for the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> was Helez <WH2503> the Pelonite <WH6397>, of the children <WH1121> of Efrayim <WH669>: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

The eighth <WH8066> captain for the eighth <WH8066> month <WH2320> was Sibbecai <WH5444> the Hushathite <WH2843>, of the Zarhites <WH2227>: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

The ninth <WH8671> captain for the ninth <WH8671> month <WH2320> was Abiezer <WH44> the Anetothite <WH6069>, of the Benjamites <WH1145>: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

The tenth <WH6224> captain for the tenth <WH6224> month <WH2320> was Maharai <WH4121> the Netophathite <WH5200>, of the Zarhites <WH2227>: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

The eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> captain for the eleventh <WH6249> <WH6240> month <WH2320> was Benaiah <WH1141> the Pirathonite <WH6553>, of the children <WH1121> of Efrayim <WH669>: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

The twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> captain for the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> month <WH2320> was Heldai <WH2469> the Netophathite <WH5200>, of `Otni'el <WH6274>: and in his course <WH4256> were twenty <WH6242> and four <WH702> thousand <WH505>.

Furthermore over the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: the ruler <WH5057> of the Re'uvenites <WH7206> was Eliezer <WH461> the son <WH1121> of Zichri <WH2147>: of the SHim`onites <WH8099>, Shephatiah <WH8203> the son <WH1121> of Maachah <WH4601>:
Of the L'vi'im <WH3881>, Hashabiah <WH2811> the son <WH1121> of Kemuel <WH7055>: of the Aharonites <WH175>, Zadok <WH6659>:
Of Y'hudah <WH3063>, Elihu <WH453>, one of the brethren <WH251> of David <WH1732>: of Yissakhar <WH3485>, Omri <WH6018> the son <WH1121> of Mikha'el <WH4317>:
Of Z'vulun <WH2074>, Ishmaiah <WH3460> the son <WH1121> of `Ovadyah-yahu <WH5662>: of Naftali <WH5321>, Jerimoth <WH3406> the son <WH1121> of Azriel <WH5837>:

Of the children <WH1121> of Efrayim <WH669>, Hoshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Azaziah <WH5812>: of the half <WH2677> tribe <WH7626> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, Joel <WH3100> the son <WH1121> of Pedaiah <WH6305>:
Of the half <WH2677> tribe of M'nasheh <WH4519> in Gil`ad <WH1568>, Iddo <WH3035> the son <WH1121> of Z'kharyah-yahu <WH2148>: of Binyamin <WH1144>, Jaasiel <WH3300> the son <WH1121> of Abner <WH74>:
Of Dan <WH1835>, Azareel <WH5832> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham <WH3395>. These were the princes <WH8269> of the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

But David <WH1732> took <WH5375> <WH8804> not the number <WH4557> of them from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and under <WH4295>: because the YY <WH3068> had said <WH559> <WH8804> he would increase <WH7235> <WH8687> Yisra'EL <WH3478> like to the stars <WH3556> of the heavens <WH8064>.

Yo'av <WH3097> the son <WH1121> of TZ'ruyah <WH6870> began <WH2490> <WH8689> to number <WH4487> <WH8800>, but he finished <WH3615> <WH8765> not, because there fell wrath <WH7110> for it <WH2063> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>; neither was the number <WH4557> put <WH5927> <WH8804> in the account <WH4557> of the chronicles <WH1697> <WH3117> of king <WH4428> David <WH1732>.

And over the king's <WH4428> treasures <WH214> was Azmaveth <WH5820> the son <WH1121> of Adiel <WH5717>: and over the storehouses <WH214> in the fields <WH7704>, in the cities <WH5892>, and in the villages <WH3723>, and in the castles <WH4026>, was Jehonathan <WH3083> the son <WH1121> of Uziyah-yahu <WH5818>:
And over them that did <WH6213> <WH8802> the work <WH4399> of the field <WH7704> for tillage <WH5656> of the ground <WH127> was Ezri <WH5836> the son <WH1121> of Chelub <WH3620>:

And over the vineyards <WH3754> was Shimei <WH8096> the Ramathite <WH7435>: over the increase of the vineyards <WH3754> for the wine <WH3196> cellars <WH214> was Zabdi <WH2067> the Shiphmite <WH8225>:

And over the olive trees <WH2132> and the sycomore trees <WH8256> that were in the low plains <WH8219> was Baalhanan <WH1177> the Gederite <WH1451>: and over the cellars <WH214> of oil <WH8081> was Yo'ash <WH3135>:

And over the herds <WH1241> that fed <WH7462> <WH8802> in Sharon <WH8289> was Shitrai <WH7861> the Sharonite <WH8290>: and over the herds <WH1241> that were in the valleys <WH6010> was Shaphat <WH8202> the son <WH1121> of Adlai <WH5724>:
Over the camels <WH1581> also was Obil <WH179> the Yishma`elim <WH3459>: and over the asses <WH860> was Jehdeiah <WH3165> the Meronothite <WH4824>:
And over the flocks <WH6629> was Jaziz <WH3151> the Hagerite <WH1905>. All these were the rulers <WH8269> of the substance <WH7399> which was king <WH4428> David's <WH1732>.

Also Y'honatan <WH3083> David's <WH1732> uncle <WH1730> was a counsellor <WH3289> <WH8802>, a wise <WH995> <WH8688> man <WH376>, and a scribe <WH5608> <WH8802>: and Jehiel <WH3171> the son <WH1121> of Hachmoni <WH2453> was with the king's <WH4428> sons <WH1121>:
And Ahithophel <WH302> was the king's <WH4428> counsellor <WH3289> <WH8802>: and Hushai <WH2365> the Archite <WH757> was the king's <WH4428> companion <WH7453>:
And after <WH310> Ahithophel <WH302> was Y'hoyada <WH3077> the son <WH1121> of Benaiah <WH1141>, and Evyatar <WH54>: and the general <WH8269> of the king's <WH4428> army <WH6635> was Yo'av <WH3097>.
